mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMM_REPLY (CREPLY_NO, CREPLY_CONTENT, CREPLY_DATE, CREPLY_GROUP, CREPLY_LEVEL, CREPLY_INDENT, CBOARD_NO, USER_NO, CREPLY_DELETE_CHK, COMM_UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_COMM_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{creply_content}, sysdate, 1, 1, 1, #{cboard_no}, #{user_no}, 0, sysdate)
